post.text: Three pages of Trump's tax returns confirm he's a business failure who's gotten rich at your expense. Imagine what he's hiding in the rest.

comment.author: Kirby
comment.text: Hillary used the same tax rules and guess what hillary showed a loss also. Larger issues are more important.like keeping Americans safe ! Not one forgein leader respects Hillary ! They laugh at her.

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: the issue is not showing a loss, the issue is not paying taxes, Hilary has paid taxes. Last years she paid 3MM in federal taxes. How much did Trump pay in taxes last year?

replies.text: tell me did you pay your taxes? If you did than Trump thinks you are a loser.
